website_summaries.verdict: A heavy-duty post driver that weighs a little more than some of the competition at 18 lbs.
pros: Handles are thick and tapered for ease of use/comfort

customer_reviews.title: Works really well, BUT...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to drive the posts for my deer fence around my veggie garden. It is very heavy, and it works very well! BUT... There was a little defect in the metal on the handle—the enamel stuff was chipped/sharp. It cut my brother's hand when he was driving the posts. Yes... we could've worn work gloves, but it was such a small job that we didn't think it was necessary. And we shouldn't have had to wear gloves...the company's quality control people should've caught this issue. I thought about sending this back because of the defect, but decided it wasn't worth the trouble, so we just filed down the handle defect ourselves.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Wells

customer_reviews.title: Best tool ever!
